question: Which of the following was the period of the "Great Cretan Revolution"?
explanation: The Cretan revolt of 1866â€“1869 or Great Cretan Revolution was a three-year uprising in Crete against Ottoman rule, the third and largest in a series of Cretan revolts between the end of the Greek War of Independence in 1830 and the establishment of the independent Cretan State in 1898.
